boxes.text: You get paid out based upon what the pool sets the min payout amount. A pool's min payout amount can vary from pool to pool. Click on the pool link to visit their website.

boxes.title: Learn more about BLOC
boxes.text: BLOC is a fast, easy to use and private decentralized cryptocurrency combined with a powerfull ecosystem and an eco-friendly mining algorithm.

boxes.text: Affiliation, Airdrop missions, all the latest informations about BLOC concentrated in one place to make it easier. Discover the BLOC Dashboard

boxes.text: Introducing the first BLOC Wallet for iOS with a focus on accessibility, security and simplicity. BLOC Wallet makes getting started with BLOC easier than ever.

boxes.title: Need more help ? We got you covered
boxes.text: If this is your first time hearing about BLOC, we recommend starting by visiting the official BLOC.MONEY website but also the BLOC Wiki where you can read precious informations. You can also join BLOC Discord. We and the community will be happy to help you.

boxes.title: Don't forget to sleep mine !
boxes.text: An easy way to mine BLOC with your smartphone and make a passive income while you are sleeping! Watch the video and start sleep mining today!

boxes.title: BLOC Ecosystem
boxes.text: One of our main goal is to provide a cryptocurrency which is safe, easy to use and attractive combined with a powerful ecosystem for users, to benefits advantages from multiple type of industries like never done before.

boxes.title: Learn more about Turtlecoin
boxes.text: TurtleCoin is a fast, easy and private cryptocurrency which allows you to send money to friends and businesses.

boxes.title: TurtleCoin as a Service
boxes.text: Build on-chain apps in an easy, fun and fast way on the TRTL Network. Integrate TRTL Services easily with your application or game with our RESTful API and push notfication system.

boxes.title: Learn more about RYO
boxes.text: RYO allows you to use a new ghost address for every transaction you receive. Never receive coins with the same address twice, even further reducing the astronomically tiny chance of you and your transactions to be traced.

boxes.title: Academic Study
boxes.text: RYO, as a fork from Monero which itself was initially based on the CryptoNote protocol, inherits all whitepapers and academic studies from CryptoNote and Monero Research Lab. Additionally, Ryo has pioneered technologies such as Cryptonight-Heavy, which have been used by numerous other Monero forks.

boxes.title: Learn more about Haven
boxes.text: XHV A fully decentralized, private, algorithmic stablecoin that can be stored in a Haven wallet which can be seen as a private and decentralized USD-based bank account for everyone.

boxes.title: Academic Study
boxes.text: No peg. No asset backing. Just a dual coin blockchain. Price-stability of the XUSD stablecoin is achieved without an unsustainable peg or asset backing.
